trans-unit.source: Represents a data view in the data store.
trans-unit.target: 表示数据存储区中的数据视图。

trans-unit.source: The DesignerDataView class is one of several types that represent the schema of a data store at design-time.
trans-unit.target: DesignerDataView 类是表示在设计时数据存储的架构的几种类型之一。

trans-unit.source: These schema items are made available to controls by designers implementing the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Data.IDataEnvironment> interface.
trans-unit.target: 这些架构项都由实现的设计器提供给控件<xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Data.IDataEnvironment>接口。</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Data.IDataEnvironment>

trans-unit.source: Controls access schema objects by calling the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Data.IDataEnvironment.GetConnectionSchema%2A> method of the interface.
trans-unit.target: 控件通过调用访问架构对象<xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Data.IDataEnvironment.GetConnectionSchema%2A>接口方法。</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Data.IDataEnvironment.GetConnectionSchema%2A>

trans-unit.source: The DesignerDataView class represents a single data view in the data store.
trans-unit.target: DesignerDataView 类表示数据存储区中的单个数据视图。

trans-unit.source: A collection of DesignerDataView objects is returned when you call the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Data.IDesignerDataSchema.GetSchemaItems%2A> method with the `schemaClass` parameter set to <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Data.DesignerDataSchemaClass.Views?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: 在调用时返回的 DesignerDataView 对象的集合<xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Data.IDesignerDataSchema.GetSchemaItems%2A>方法替换`schemaClass`参数设置为<xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Data.DesignerDataSchemaClass.Views?displayProperty=fullName>。</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Data.DesignerDataSchemaClass.Views?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Data.IDesignerDataSchema.GetSchemaItems%2A>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.Data.DesignerDataView"></xref> class with the specified name.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.Data.DesignerDataView"></xref>具有指定名称的类。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.Data.DesignerDataView"></xref> class with the specified name and owner.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.Data.DesignerDataView"></xref>类具有指定的名称和所有者。

trans-unit.source: The data-store owner of the view.
trans-unit.target: 视图的数据存储区所有者。
